SELECT

PATH "/Message",
PATH "/0:Severity",
PATH "/EventType"

WHERE

AND($4, TYPEID i=5000 PATH "/Severity" GREATERTHAN $"ref")

FOR
$"ref":= 99
$4:= OFTYPE ns=1;i=5000
